author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and designed the sound for this rare footage of Montclair, New Jersey in the 1920s. shows Bloomfield Avenue near the corner of Park Street, looking slightly northeast, with the Louis Harris and Hughes buildings visible on the north side of the avenue. Additional scenes capture different areas around Montclair, including the historic Lackawanna Train Station. The footage also references the founding of Brookside School in 1925 by a group of Montclair parents for about 30 students in grades K–6.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔sound design added only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source fro
title: New jersey 1920s in color, Montclair [60fps, Remastered] Sound Design
